# FaciesIdentificator

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

Identificatore delle facies pastorali (sensu Cavallero et al. - 2007) di rilievi vegetazionali

## Installation

You can install the development version of FaciesIdentificator from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MarcoPittarello/FaciesIdentificator")
```

## ShinyApp

Eseguire il seguente script:

`library(FaciesIdentificator)`

`FaciesIdentificator::FIapp()`
